articles.content: As per Cert-In, EventBot largely targeting financial apps like Paypal Business, Revolut, Barclays, UniCredit, CapitalOne UK, HSBC UK, TransferWise, Coinbase, paysafecard etc.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Duo specs leak - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The company's foldable device is now expected to debut well ahead of its initial 'holiday season' intentions.
articles.content:
Microsoft is busy testing the upcoming Surface Duo internally, a device that has two screens on two equal sides, with a 360-degree hinge between them. So while neither display panel is foldable, that hinge gives you plenty of use case flexibility.

articles.author: PCMag
articles.title: Google's Chrome browser will block battery-draining, data-guzzling ads - Mashable
articles.description: If an ad reaches its limit, Chrome will pull the plug, forcing it to show as a gray blank space.
articles.content:
Google is working to make the Chrome browser shut down ads that drain your devices battery life or needlessly consume your internets bandwidth. 
The scale of the problem is pretty minor, affecting 0.3 percent of all the ads on the internet, according to Chro… [+2358 chars]

articles.author: Antoine Engels
articles.title: Apple fans, this is what a real flagship killer looks like - AndroidPIT
articles.description: Offering great value-for-money, the Poco F2 Pro is set to regain the flagship killer mantle of 2020, usurping Apple's iPhone SE 2020 in the process.
articles.content: A Snapdragon 865 chipset accompanied by a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen without any edges or notches, a quadruple photo module with a 64MP Sony IMX686 main sensor at the back, all of that going for 499 ($539). The Poco F2 Pro may be a rebranded Redmi K30 Pro, but i… [+3049 chars]

articles.title: Oppo Find X2, Find X2 Pro Smartphones Teased on Amazon India Ahead of India Launch - LatestLY

articles.description: Indian e-commerce giant announced that the Motorola Edge+ will be available in India on May 19. No clues about vanilla Edge arrival in the country.
